amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 115-702 as En Bloc No. 6: Nos. 128, 129, 130, 131, 132, 133, 134, 135, 136, 137, 138, 139, 140, 141, 142, 143, and 144.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A025) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A025) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
